author: Camilo Smith, Chron.com
title: Photos from the annual gathering of clowns in Mexico City could give you nightmares - San Antonio Express-News
text:
Photo: ALFREDO ESTRELLA, AFP/Getty Images Image 1 of / 40 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 40 The International Clown Convention in Mexico City has been around for two decades. A brotherhood of those dedicated to the craft and profession have been gathering here for 20 years.
Keep clicking to see images from this years convention. But warning, if you're afraid of clowns, this might be nightmare inducing. The International Clown Convention in Mexico City has been around for two decades. A brotherhood of those dedicated to the craft and profession have been gathering here for 20 years.

Photo: RONALDO SCHEMIDT, AFP/Getty Images Image 40 of 40 Photos from the annual gathering of clowns in Mexico City could give you nightmares 1 / 40 Back to Gallery For 20 years an international brotherhood of clowns has been meeting in Mexico City. Under the name the International Clown Convention and Laughter Fair, the four-day gathering runs from Oct. 19 – Oct. 22. The event draws hundreds of clowns from Spanish-speaking countries.
RELATED: Here are the scary things that Americans fear the most
Of course seeing between 500 and 800 clowns walking the streets could do some serious damage to anyone with coulrophobia, or a fear of clowns. Of course clowns have their place in Mexico, which has seen violence get out of control within the past decade, and their laughter helps people forget. The gathering has been known to hold a laugh-a-thon to oppose the country’s violence.
Check out images in the slideshow above, if you dare, of the most recent gathering of clowns, as well as those from years’ past.
